name: OnelinkHome
0:
”Alexa, ask Onelink, what is the status of my smoke alarm”
”Alexa, ask Onelink, status of home”
”How do I test my alarm?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: onelink
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Onelink skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Onelink Safe & Sound and the Onelink Smart Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarms by voice. To use this skill, you will need a Onelink by First Alert Safe & Sound and/or the Onelink Smart Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm. To get started, select the Enable Skill button in the Alexa App to link your Onelink account.

Once the skill is enabled and your account is linked you can say “Alexa, ask Onelink” or “Alexa, open Onelink".
If you have Onelink Safe & Sound and/or the Onelink Smart Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarms. you can get help, for example: “Alexa, ask Onelink, how do I test my alarm.”
You can also get the status, for example: “Alexa, ask Onelink what is the status of my alarm.”

If you need help, please contact us at onelinksupport@firstalert.com or see our FAQ at https://www.firstalert.com/support/faqs/.
